metadata.description: Send money worldwide with Twister. Fast, secure, and affordable money transfer services powered by Western Union.
metadata.ogDescription: Fast and secure international money transfers with Twister and Western Union.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.lead: We are a trusted travel agency and the official Master Agent for Western Union in Poland, proudly connecting people and places for over 30 years.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.paragraph1: Twister is a well-established travel agency with over 30 years of experience on the market—and for more than 20 of those years, we've also been helping people stay connected through fast and secure money transfers. As the official Master Agent for Western Union in Poland, we proudly manage a nationwide network of over 120 trusted agents. Whether you're sending money to loved ones or receiving support from abroad, we're here to make every transaction easy, reliable, and stress-free. We offer full support to both customers and agents across the country.
mission.paragraph2: Interested in becoming a Western Union agent? Partner with us to join our growing network and enjoy preferred rates, expert guidance, and personalized support.

westernUnion.title: About Western Union
westernUnion.lead: Western Union is a global leader in cross-border money transfers, offering fast and reliable services across 200+ countries. It connects bank accounts, digital wallets, cards, and retail locations to make sending and receiving money easy for individuals and businesses.

items.title: Global Reach
items.description: Transfer money to over 200 countries and territories.

items.title: Multiple Transfer Options
items.description: Send funds online, via the mobile app, or in person at more than 500,000 agent locations.

items.title: Flexible Delivery Methods
items.description: Recipients can receive money directly into their bank accounts, mobile wallets, or pick up cash at agent locations.

items.title: Real-Time Tracking
items.description: Monitor your transfers with a unique Money Transfer Control Number (MTCN).

items.title: Competitive Exchange Rates
items.description: Benefit from real-time exchange rates and transparent fees.

items.title: Security and Reliability
items.description: Enjoy peace of mind with encrypted transfers and robust fraud prevention measures.

history.title: History Brief
history.lead: Western Union was founded in 1851 as a telegraph company and has evolved into a global leader in cross-border, cross-currency money movement and payments.
paragraphs: Western Union started its business as a telegraph service provider, revolutionizing communications in the United States.
By 1861, Western Union had completed the first transcontinental telegraph line, connecting the East and West coasts.
In 1871, Western Union introduced money transfer services, which in time became the company's main business.

Throughout the 20th century, Western Union continuously developed its services and global reach around the world. Today, with a presence in more than 200 countries and territories, Western Union has adapted to the changing needs of its customers. It offers a wide range of financial services that connect people and businesses around the world.
Western Union's legacy of innovation continues as the company embraces digital transformation while maintaining its commitment to serving communities around the world.

metadata.title: Track Your Money Transfer | Twister
metadata.description: Easily check the status of your international money transfer with our secure Western Union tracking service.

trackTransfer.title: Track Your Money Transfer
trackTransfer.lead: Easily check the status of your international money transfer with our secure tracking service.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.description1: Stay informed about your money transfer status in real-time. Our tracking system provides instant updates on where your money is in the transfer process, from sending to delivery.
howItWorks.description2: To track your transfer, you'll need your Money Transfer Control Number (MTCN) which was provided when you initiated the transfer. For security purposes, you'll be redirected to the official Western Union tracking page.

trackTransfer.redirectNotice: You will be redirected to the official Western Union track a transfer service.

prices.title: Visit Us|and Send Money|Now!
prices.description: At our office in Wrocław, you can send or receive money. We're waiting for you.
prices.promotion: Current promotion: Send money to Ukraine for only 9.99 PLN!

howToSend.title: How to Send a Money Transfer

steps.title: Visit an Agent Location
steps.description: Find your nearest Western Union agent location using online agent locator tool.

steps.title: Provide Recipient Details
steps.description: Share the recipient's name and destination country. For bank transfers, you'll need their account information.

steps.title: Show Valid ID
steps.description: Present a government-issued photo ID and provide your contact information.

steps.title: Pay for Your Transfer
steps.description: Pay the transfer amount plus fees using your preferred payment method.

steps.title: Get Your Receipt
steps.description: Keep your receipt with the tracking number (MTCN) to share with your recipient and track your transfer.

howToReceive.title: How to Receive a Money Transfer

steps.title: Visit an Agent Location
steps.description: Go to any Western Union agent location with proper identification.

steps.title: Provide Transfer Details
steps.description: Give the agent your tracking number (MTCN) and sender's information.

steps.title: Show Valid ID
steps.description: Present a government-issued photo ID that matches the recipient name.

steps.title: Receive Your Money
steps.description: Collect your money and keep the receipt for your records.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: Global Reach: Transfer money to over 200 countries and territories.
disclaimer.westernUnionNotice: Western Union makes money from foreign exchange. When choosing a money transmitter, carefully compare both transfer fees and exchange rates. Fees, foreign exchange rates, and taxes may vary by brand, channel, and location based on a number of factors.

meta.title: Become an Agent
meta.description: Join our Western Union agent network. Start earning additional income with Western Union money transfer services.

header.title: Join our sub-agent network even today!
header.subtitle: We offer professional advice, a starter kit with a gift, training and marketing support. Don't wait, open yourself to new opportunities and join our network of Western Union sub-agents today! Our company is an official Western Union partner with 25 years of experience. We work with more than 200 sub-agents in Poland. Our partners include currency exchange offices, travel agencies, toll agencies, postal outlets and many others.

form.title: Complete the form and start earning!
form.subtitle: Western Union agent network—an avenue of opportunities for your business. Here are some of the benefits you get to enjoy:

earnings.title: Real earnings every month
earnings.description: Diversify your business, attract new footfall and start earning from day one. Western Union transactions takes less than 2 minutes and brings you additional revenue stream.

global.title: A strong global presence
global.description: Western Union is an industry leader in global money transfer through a network of hundreds of thousands Western Union agent locations in more than 200 countries and territories.

innovative.title: Innovative money transfer
innovative.description: Our customers can enjoy sending money right from the Western Union agent location.

customers.title: Attract new and more customers
customers.description: Thanks to Western Union's reputation and the support we offer you in promoting our service, you'll be able to increase footfall at your location.

brand.description: With more than 170 years' experience moving money, Western Union is an industry leader in global money transfer and payment services. Western Union offers innovative and effective money transfers. Sending money faster by initiating the transfer from the Western Union app and paying directly at an agent location.

tools.title: Tools to get started
tools.description: A step-by-step training Western Union cares about providing support for you to get started. From the start, you'll benefit from training in standards of excellence in money transfers as well as the regulations you must comply with.

starter.title: Starter kit
starter.description: We offer you for free a starter kit to walk you through your new activity and help you increase awareness.

support.title: Western Union support
support.description: We provide an efficient and reactive support to all our agent locations. Easy to contact by phone and email, the support team is ready to answer any technical question.

testimonial.quote: Great cooperation with Master Agent Twister. For many years, everything has been on time and trouble-free. You can always count on help and support. Working with them is a pure pleasure. I definitely recommend it!
testimonial.name: Kantor Wymiany Walut CFS
testimonial.title: Western Union Subagent

hero.title: Western Union Money Transfers in Poland
hero.subtitle: For over 20 years, we've been Western Union's partner in Poland. Send and receive money safely!

becomeAgent.title: Join our network of Western Union sub-agents and start earning today.
becomeAgent.lead: Twister Poland has been an official partner and Master Agent of Western Union for 25 years. We proudly support our customers' money transfer needs with fast and secure service.
description: For over two decades, TWISTER Poland has been delivering fast, secure financial services across the country. Founded in 1999, we specialize in international money transfers and tourism services. As the proud Master Agent of Western Union in Poland, we manage a network of 200+ partners offering global money transfers with confidence.

Our partners include currency exchange offices, travel agencies, and payment agencies. All partner locations are properly marked and process money transfers while maintaining the highest standards of customer service. Whether you're sending money to loved ones or receiving support from abroad, we're here to ensure every transaction is smooth, secure, and stress-free.
Want to become a Western Union sub-agent? Join our growing network and benefit from preferential rates, professional consulting, and individual support at every stage of cooperation.
